name: RAIN CITY (itch)
description:
Rain City

AS LORD OVERSEER YOU NEED TO KEEP A BALANCE OF OPPRESSION AND HARMONY TO KEEP CHAOS AT BAY GET AS MANY POINTS AS YOU CAN BEFORE THE WORTHLESS CITIZENS START A REVOLUTION AND THROW YOU OUT OF POWER.

Controls

Click to do something and numbers 1,2,3 do things as well, Scroll wheel zooms in and out, The arrow keys also do something :D
